typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Column_1 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> tncsource1
tncsource1 split(rlike(Column_1, '^01'),
	rlike(Column_1, '^03'),
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplit1@(dtsink1, dtsink2, dtsinkother)
ConditionalSplit1@dtsink1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	filePattern:'concat(\'tns_1_[n]_\', formatDateTime(dataset().WindowStartTime, \'MM-dd-yyyy_hh-mm-ss\')).',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
ConditionalSplit1@dtsink2 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	filePattern:'concat(\'tns_3_[n]_\', formatDateTime(dataset().WindowStartTime, \'MM-dd-yyyy_hh-mm-ss\')).',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink2
ConditionalSplit1@dtsinkother sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	filePattern:'concat(\'tns_x_[n]_\', formatDateTime(dataset().WindowStartTime, \'MM-dd-yyyy_hh-mm-ss\')).',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink3
